column4: your graphic card is not supported by ATI anymore, there are no more drivers to install. You use the ones Ubuntu already is using.
yes under 9.04 i had 3d accel and now i don't have so i want to find the right...
you need to make a special config. there are no more driveres from ATI for you.
look in the forum or google for "Ubuntu Karmic x300"
